name: Bible Paloozah
description:
Bible Paloozah offers fifteen challenging questions on the Bible to test your bible knowledge. Can you answer all fifteen questions correctly? Challenge your friends to see if they know all the answers too.

***Updated****   9/8/2018

Fixed bug which caused the score screen to come up prematurely.

Fixed bug which made Mathew Question 3 not reappear after resetting the game.

Added individual scores to score screen so that users can identify which questions they got wrong.
